EmailTemplate.name: Case Creation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{{Case.SuppliedName}}},
Thank you for reaching out to us! Weâ€™ve received your request and have created a case for you. Our team is already working on it, and we will keep you updated on its progress.
Case Details:
-
Case No: {{{Case.CaseNumber}}}
-
Subject:{{{Case.Subject}}}
-
Description:{{{Case.Description}}}
We understand the importance of resolving this issue as quickly as possible and will be in touch with further updates soon.
Thank you for choosing us!
Best regards,
Respira Support Team
